Package org.proto4j.graph

Interface BracketLinePainter

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultBracketLinePainter
public interface BracketLinePainter
Classes implementing this interface are used to draw the lines between different brackets. Some default painting implementations are given in the BracketUtil class.
See Also:
BracketUtil, DefaultBracketLinePainter

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void paintLine​(JBracketView<?> view, java.awt.Graphics gs, int column, int row)
    Draws one line (or more) in the given graphics context according to the given location specified by column and row.

  • Method Details

    • paintLine

      void paintLine​(JBracketView<?> view, java.awt.Graphics gs, int column, int row)
      Draws one line (or more) in the given graphics context according to the given location specified by column and row.
      Parameters:
      view - the JBracketView we're painting
      gs - the graphics context
      column - the current column index
      row - the cells row index
